name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging **Kubernetes**, **GitOps**, **Terraform**, and **Ansible** to implement efficient infrastructure and deployment strategies. My proficiency in continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD), along with monitoring tools like **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, enables me to ensure high-performance systems that are secure and compliant with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
In addition to my core DevOps skills, I possess a strong scripting capability in **Bash**, **Python**, and am familiar with **Ruby** and **Go**. I approach challenges with a hands-on mentality and an agile mindset, driving successful project outcomes through effective collaboration and problem-solving.
My background includes full-stack development experience using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, allowing me to understand and integrate development processes seamlessly. I've contributed to enterprise-grade platforms with AI/ML capabilities, developing solutions that harness the power of **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for MLOps workflows.
